Lobbied in support of needed changes to the Treasury Department negotiated OECD Pillar 2 tax provisions and educated on the detrimental effects these provisions would have on American companies. Lobbied in support of extending the time period for the tax credit for refined coal and the Sen. Daines Amendment to the Inflation Reduction Act.
